orderError.sorry: We're sorry, an error has occurred.
orderError.unableToReceive: We're unable to process your order at the moment.
orderError.contact: Please contact us via phone or WhatsApp at 054-6629179 to handle your order.

orderSuccess.submitted: You order has been successfully submitted!
orderSuccess.payment: We will contact you soon to confirm the order details and address the payment.

error.generalErrorMessage: It seems we're having some trouble loading this page. Please try again later.
error.404: We can't seem to find this page.

comingSoon.construction: This page is still under construction.
comingSoon.socialMedia: Follow us on social media to know when it comes.
comingSoon.whenItComes: And when it does... it'll be so deliciously good!

topping.question: Would you like anything special on top?
topping.example: e.g., chocolate frosting, whipped cream, Oreo cookies...

flavors.question: Would you like any specific flavors?
flavors.example: e.g., vanilla layer followed by a cookie layer, Lotus cookie crumbles...

writing.question: Would you like any special writing? If so, please specify where.
writing.example: e.g., the words 'Happy birthday, my love' on the plate of the cake, the number '18' on top...

productNotes.question: Are there any other special notes you would like to make?

introduction.1: Is your boyfriend/girlfriend's birthday coming up and you're not sure what to get?
introduction.2: Do you want to suprise a relative with a delicious treat?
introduction.4: Cup dessert in a various flavors: Lotus, Ferrero Rocher, Kinder Bueno, Kinder Chocolate, Hershey's and Oreo
introduction.5: Assemble the perfect cup desserts package!

cupDesserts.pickQuantity: How many cup desserts would you like in your box?
cupDesserts.pickflavors: Which and how many of each flavour would you like?
cupDesserts.customFlavorNotice: By the way, we noticed you wanted some custom flavors, we'll be sure to talk about it when we contact you.
